definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: To me, in the love of the river, I often feel like I was upstream .
sentences.chinese: 于我，在爱情的河流里，我经常觉得自己在逆流而上。

sentences.english: Part 4 Liao River Basin Water Pollution Prevention recommendations to improve the legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是辽河流域水污染防治。

sentences.english: River is the ultimate receiving water of the urban wastewater.
sentences.chinese: 河流是城市污水的最终受纳体。

sentences.english: Changle over mountain rivers flowing through hilly, water development, water rich.
sentences.chinese: 长乐以上，河流经丘陵山区，水系发育，水量丰富。

sentences.english: It is a cross-border international river.
sentences.chinese: 是一条跨越国界的河流。

sentences.english: Severn River is the longest river in Britain 355km.
sentences.chinese: 塞文河是英国最长的河流。

sentences.english: In the late summer, the rivers swell and often burst their banks.
sentences.chinese: 夏末，河流涨水，常常冲决河岸。
有蓝岭群山，山纳多河流。

sentences.english: The quality of air isn't clean as before. The river is becoming dirty.
sentences.chinese: 空气质量不如以前那么清新了，河流也变得很脏。

sentences.english: Love rivers have wound the life, only then sees sweetheart's fisherman wharf.
sentences.chinese: 爱情河流过蜿蜒了生活，才看见情人的渔人码头。

sentences.english: A covered bridge traverses the stream.
sentences.chinese: 一座有顶盖的桥横跨这条河流。

sentences.english: Each rive has its upward, middle and backward part.
sentences.chinese: 每条河流都有上游，中游和下游。

sentences.english: It is concluded that controlling the external pollution resource is the key factor to guarantee self-purification ability of river.
sentences.chinese: 说明控制外源污染是河流保证自我修复能力的关键。

sentences.english: Dream big heart wide, learn to sea, rivers tolerance is self-cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 梦想大心宽，学会海洋，河流的公差是修养。

sentences.english: Five rivers run through the city, connecting it to the eastern Bohai Sea.
sentences.chinese: 有五条河流从城市穿过，流人东边的渤海。
